channel.title: ***&.::How do i make my server a no ip?&::.&***
channel.description:
How do i make my server a no-ip server?
[b]-I went to www.no-ip.com -Made account -Downloaded DUC thing -Changed name of 'run server' -Added Port[/b]
Please help me, because i don't know what i did wrong, or what i still need to do. Thanks!
.::King::.
